quotes.text: Truv has redefined what partnership means â€” delivering accurate, trustworthy data, rapid implementation, and the agility to help us close loans faster and more confidently.
quotes.author: Tom Durney
quotes.title: EVP of Corporate Operations Support

quotes.text: Our processors love that we can get ahold of someone at Truv within 4 hours. Compare that to other vendors, where our team couldn't reach a human for 2 years - it's night and day.
quotes.author: Jessica Kipnis
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: Truv delivers on every front. Cost savings, product innovation, reliable technology, and most importantly, a partnership approach that keeps our success at the center of everything they do.
quotes.author: Magesh Sarma
quotes.title: Chief Information and Strategy Officer

quotes.text: We have borrowers try Truv first because it has proven most reliable. We now rely less on manual VOIEs and instant databases, saving us 80% on verifications and hours in processing.
quotes.author: Austin Coleman
quotes.title: SVP of Mortgage Lending

quotes.text: We prefer having a Truv report over other verification providers because the data is more granular, comprehensive, broken down by income source, and includes paystubs & W-2s.
quotes.author: Tanner Allen
quotes.title: Partner

quotes.text: The cost of the Truv's VOIE is the most important reason to use Truv. It is saving us thousands of dollars.
quotes.author: Mary Rodgers
quotes.title: EVP of Corporate Strategy

quotes.text: We went from 25% conversion to 50%. Right now, in the VOE space, that's a really good percentage.
quotes.author: J.R. Huber
quotes.title: EVP Sales & Production

quotes.text: Since we started our partnership, we've taken our costs for verifications from 8 basis points per loan down to 3 basis points per loan.
quotes.author: Femi Ayi
quotes.title: EVP Operations

quotes.text: There's no excuse for lenders to not look at a product like Truv. It works, it's easy for the borrower, the data set is superior, you benefit from GSE approvals, and the price is more competitive. It's a no-brainer.
quotes.author: Justin Venhousen
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: As folks that have spent their entire 30-year+ career in auto, we believe that with the help of Truv, we've built the greatest pay stub report that the industry has ever seen.
quotes.author: Lou Loquasto
quotes.title: CRO

quotes.text: What truly set Truv apart was the team's hands-on approach to customer service, from development to implementation to post go-live.
quotes.author: Jonathan Spinetto
quotes.title: COO & Co-Founder

quotes.text: The relationship feels more important than transactions, and that's important to us. There's a hands-on approach that's hard to find in vendors.
quotes.author: Darrell Tadley
quotes.title: CEO

quotes.text: The responsiveness and agility of the team was instrumental in the decision to partner with Truv. It was teamwork from the start.
quotes.author: Sergio Terentev
quotes.title: Founder & CEO

quotes.text: When we started looking at other providers, we were looking for a more holistic approach to increase the coverage of borrowers we could verify while decreasing cost. Truv helped us accomplish this objective.
quotes.author: Richard Plummer
quotes.title: EVP of Operations

quotes.text: We had a choice: Go with a more expensive, legacy option like The Work Number, or go with Truv, a nimble team ready to work with us, move with us, and grow with us.
quotes.author: Andrew Collins
quotes.title: CEO
